name: ractive-chrome-extension
description: View and edit Ractive.js components using Chrome Dev Tools
author: Peter Mekhaeil <peter@mekhaeil.com>

scripts.start: npm install && npm run-script build && npm run-script copy
scripts.build:ractive-json-editor: cd node_modules/ractive-json-editor && npm install && npm run-script build
scripts.copy: npm run-script clean && npm run-script copy:ractive && npm run-script copy:ractive-json-editor
